name: @faiss-node/native
description: Node.js native binding for Facebook FAISS vector similarity search

scripts.publish:local: bash -c 'export NODE_AUTH_TOKEN=$(grep NPM_TOKEN .env | cut -d \"=\" -f2) && npm config set //registry.npmjs.org/:_authToken $NODE_AUTH_TOKEN && npm publish --access public'
scripts.publish:dry-run: bash -c 'export NODE_AUTH_TOKEN=$(grep NPM_TOKEN .env | cut -d \"=\" -f2) && npm config set //registry.npmjs.org/:_authToken $NODE_AUTH_TOKEN && npm publish --access public --dry-run'
